TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UploadStringCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las instancias de esta clase se pasan a la .Instances of this class are passed to the . ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la carga asincrónica de una cadena.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a string. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)] El siguiente método se llama cuando se completa la carga.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As String
public: property System::String ^ Result { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene la respuesta del servidor a la operación de carga de cadena iniciada mediante la llamada a un método .

span.span: Gets the server reply to a string upload operation that is started by calling an method.

value.span: Matriz que contiene la respuesta del servidor.

span.span: A array that contains the server reply.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Debe comprobar la y propiedades para determinar si se completó la carga.You should check the and properties to determine whether the upload completed. Si el valor de propiedad es una objeto o la es el valor de la propiedad `true`, la operación asincrónica no se completó correctamente y la valor de la propiedad no será válido.If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el valor de esta propiedad.The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]
